Text: Killjoy_666, you are amazing! The installer is one of the best made ones I've ever seen, there's so many goodies in it, and the installation was SO SIMPLE. The game looks really great as well, I had it on the Xbox when it first came out, looks just as great. Thank you for this great game!

I'm glad you like it.
Thanks man!

P.S. My creation is only AutoPlay Menu.

I've collected those "goodies" throughout fan pages and few others.
